123.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
123.description1: Classic Italian pasta with a rich, slow-simmered beef and tomato sauce.

step1.title: Prepare ingredients
step1.description: Chop the onion and garlic, grate the carrot, and open the canned tomatoes.

step2.title: Sauté vegetables
step2.description: Heat olive oil in a large pan, add onion and garlic and cook until translucent. Add grated carrot and cook 2–3 minutes.

step3.title: Brown the beef
step3.description: Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon.

step4.title: Add tomatoes and simmer
step4.description: Stir in tomato paste, crushed tomatoes and red wine (if using). Season with salt and pepper. Reduce heat and simmer 30–35 minutes.

step5.title: Cook spaghetti
step5.description: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water according to package instructions until al dente. Drain.

step6.title: Serve
step6.description: Combine sauce with spaghetti or spoon sauce over pasta. Garnish with fresh basil.

14.title: Chicken Stir-Fry with Vegetables
14.description1: Quick pan-stirred chicken with colorful vegetables and a savory sauce—perfect for weeknights.

step1.title: Make the sauce
step1.description: Whisk together soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil. Set aside.

step2.title: Prep and heat pan
step2.description: Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.

step3.title: Cook chicken
step3.description: Add chicken slices and stir-fry until cooked through, about 4–5 minutes. Remove and set aside.

step4.title: Stir-fry vegetables
step4.description: Add garlic and ginger, then add peppers and broccoli. Stir-fry 3–4 minutes until crisp-tender.

step5.title: Combine and finish
step5.description: Return chicken to the pan, add sauce, toss everything until coated and heated through. Serve over rice.
